page.title: 17Dedham Leisure Activities
page.content: Groups like the Olive Branch,which is a group of younger ladies, and the Good Neighbours, a group of senior citizens, hold regular meetings. Because of the fact that Dedham is in a conservation area there are also the Dedham Vale Society and the Footpath Society who help to make sure that the area remains as beautiful as it is. There are two adult football teams and a junior one, a cricket club, a canoe club, an archery club and a tennis club which has just started. Many people in the area ride horses and there is a riding stable. There is also a branch of St John Ambulance. Each year our school entertains the Good Neighbours with gymnastics, country dancing or singing.
